RelatedSentence: The children of Sen. Thad Cochran are shocked over allegations that a blogger took a photo of their ailing mother at a nursing home and used the image for political purposes .
He is accused of sneaking into the nursing home at St. Catherine 's Village , a retirement community in Madison , Miss .
, and snapping the photo of Rose Cochran , wife of the veteran Mississippi Republican , who has dementia .
Kelly , 28 , a conservative blogger , allegedly put the photo in an anti-Cochran video posted online last month .
He took the video down about 90 minutes after uploading it , his attorney Kevin Camp said , CBS News reports .
